txt.en: 'Now you too know how the Woodmen were granted the middle woods of Eryn Lasgalen. I hope this story will be helpful in your dealings with the Woodmen in the Vales of Anduin.'
'I hope this story will be helpful in your dealings with the Woodmen in the Vales of Anduin.'
While waiting for Grimbeorn's answer, Legolas recalls a recent story told to him by King Thranduil.
